channel.title: Gtl vote
channel.description:
I have recently added Gtl vote for my server. When I have voted and the site, and press "continue" nothing happens at all What is wrong here? the callback url?
Please comment here under if you need more information.

item.title: Gtl vote
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

pkonlynoob:

Its still not working I did follow the guide. but the “continue” button is working now. but when I press it, it says Please vote on all links.

Do you have moparscape as one of the links? I know mopar doesn’t have callbacks, so it can cause issues

Read full topic

item.title: Gtl vote

item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Installing the RSPS callback system - RuneLocus
Take the callback data from that.

item.title: Gtl vote
item.dc:creator: @pkonlynoob pkonlynoob
item.description:
@pkonlynoob wrote:

Could you tell me which callbakc url I have to use for runelocus?
this is the vote page www.third-scape.com/vote/
because the one iM using atm isn’t working

Read full topic

item.title: Gtl vote
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“pkonlynoob, post:4, topic:550574”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=669485.msg4476822#msg4476822 date=1426382228]
It could be numerous things.
I’d suggest the callbacks as being one.
Could also be that your database isn’t set up correctly as well.
check your web server to see if there’s any error_log files describing the issue.
[/quote]

It might be the callback url
This is the one I’m using atm for google
http://www.third-scape.com/Vote/php/callback.php
if you open it up nothing happens[/quote]
Each site (except mopar) has their own callbacks. RuneLocus has it’s own, Rune-Server has it’s own, GTL has it’s own, and etc…
And of course nothing happens, that php file only handles back end stuff, so nothing gets printed to the web page.

Read full topic

This is the one I’m using atm for Runelocus

if you open it up nothing happens
